title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Self-Directed Mathematics Learning Competency Enhancement in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can self-directly design mathematical problem-solving processes at least 80% independently in a VR simulation environment
Learners can evaluate and provide feedback on at least three peers' mathematical problem-solving strategies in online discussions according to peer assessment criteria
Learners can create and execute self-directed learning plans for 4 weeks with at least 90% implementation adherence
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
